title: Superhero Story
description: Jake and his friends are just your typical teenagers, doing what typical teenagers do … until they cross paths with super heroes … and super villains.  Caught in the crossfire, as the forces of good and evil battle for control of the city, the stakes have never been higher, and the youths find themselves in one unbelievable situation after another.  Perfect for kids of all ages, and heroes at all stages …
author: Harlowe Pilgrim
